actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage the building of housing for moderate income seniors.
subjects: Housing for the elderly and disabled

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the low-income housing tax credit, to qualify for such credit low-income housing units that are available to individuals who have attained the age of 62 and whose incomes are 140% or less of the income limitation required for occupants of such housing units.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage the building of housing for moderate income seniors.
